Repository: plone.staticresources


Branch: refs/heads/1.x
Date: 2021-03-19T14:11:32+01:00
Author: Peter Holzer (agitator) <peter.holzer@agitator.com>
Commit: https://github.com/plone/plone.staticresources/commit/d8397044a84e7df035d74941d72925477f7642f0

Fix icon-font-path to get value from icon bundle less file.

Files changed:
M src/plone/staticresources/_scripts/_generate_gruntfile.py

b'diff --git a/src/plone/staticresources/_scripts/_generate_gruntfile.py b/src/plone/staticresources/_scripts/_generate_gruntfile.py\nindex 48b7f76e..133f7951 100644\n--- a/src/plone/staticresources/_scripts/_generate_gruntfile.py\n+++ b/src/plone/staticresources/_scripts/_generate_gruntfile.py\n@@ -75,7 +75,8 @@ def applyBrowserLayers(site):\n module.exports = function(grunt) {{\n     "use strict";\n     var lessPaths = {lesspaths},\n-        modifyVars = {modifyvars};\n+        modifyVars = {modifyvars},\n+        modifyVarsNoEmbed = {modifyvarsnoembed};\n     grunt.initConfig({{\n         pkg: grunt.file.readJSON("package.json"),\n         less: {{\n@@ -177,10 +178,10 @@ def applyBrowserLayers(site):\n                 ],\n                 options: {{\n                     compress: true,\n-                    modifyVars: modifyVars,\n+                    modifyVars: modifyVarsNoEmbed,\n                     outputSourceFiles: true,\n                     paths: lessPaths,\n-                    relativeUrls: true,\n+                    relativeUrls: false,\n                     sourceMap: true,\n                     sourceMapBasepath: "{base_path}",\n                     sourceMapURL: "{sourcemap_url}",\n@@ -330,6 +331,10 @@ def resource_to_dir(resource, file_type=".js"):\n     else:\n         modify_vars[name] = t\n \n+# remove icon-font-path to get value from less file.\n+modify_vars_no_embed = modify_vars.copy()\n+del modify_vars_no_embed[\'icon-font-path\']\n+\n # Path to search for less\n less_paths = []\n \n@@ -554,6 +559,9 @@ def resource_to_dir(resource, file_type=".js"):\n             modifyvars=json.dumps(modify_vars, indent=12, sort_keys=True).replace(\n                 "\\\\\\\\\\\\", "\\\\"\n             ),  # replace 3 backslash by one.\n+            modifyvarsnoembed=json.dumps(modify_vars_no_embed, indent=12, sort_keys=True).replace(\n+                "\\\\\\\\\\\\", "\\\\"\n+            ),  # replace 3 backslash by one.\n             requirejs=require_configs,\n             uglify=uglify_cfgs_final,\n             sed=sed_cfg_final,\n'

Repository: plone.staticresources


Branch: refs/heads/1.x
Date: 2021-03-19T14:11:32+01:00
Author: Peter Holzer (agitator) <peter.holzer@agitator.com>
Commit: https://github.com/plone/plone.staticresources/commit/28927f5e9c7b8d55aac4eba3189cc2c52b6fe02f

define static font path

Files changed:
M src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less
M src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less

b'diff --git a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\nindex d9c97227..345eebbe 100644\n--- a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\n+++ b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\n@@ -1,3 +1,2 @@\n-@fontsPrefix: \'@{staticPath}/fonts/\';\n-@icon-font-path: "@{bowerPath}bootstrap/dist/fonts/";\n-@import url("@{fontsPrefix}plone-fontello.less");\n+@fontsPrefix: \'++plone++static/fonts/\';\n+@import url("fonts/plone-fontello.less");\ndiff --git a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\nindex 870dc125..d6c80cf7 100644\n--- a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\n+++ b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\n@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@\n @import "@{bowerPath}/bootstrap/less/variables.less"; // Modify this for custom colors, font-sizes, etc\n-@icon-font-path: "@{bowerPath}/bootstrap/dist/fonts/";\n @import "@{bowerPath}/bootstrap/less/glyphicons.less";\n+// this override only works because of modifyVarsNoEmbed is used in generated Gruntfile.js\n+@icon-font-path: "++plone++static/fonts/";\n'

Repository: plone.staticresources


Branch: refs/heads/1.x
Date: 2021-03-19T14:11:32+01:00
Author: Peter Holzer (agitator) <peter.holzer@agitator.com>
Commit: https://github.com/plone/plone.staticresources/commit/0228cd7ccceba2fed4ae7ff9b43459defbcd2957

use / for font url to fix production-bundle issues

Files changed:
M src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less
M src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less

b'diff --git a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\nindex 345eebbe..d730aae2 100644\n--- a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\n+++ b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-fontello.less\n@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@\n-@fontsPrefix: \'++plone++static/fonts/\';\n+@fontsPrefix: \'/++plone++static/fonts/\';\n @import url("fonts/plone-fontello.less");\ndiff --git a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\nindex d6c80cf7..cca9c094 100644\n--- a/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\n+++ b/src/plone/staticresources/static/plone-glyphicons.less\n@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@\n @import "@{bowerPath}/bootstrap/less/variables.less"; // Modify this for custom colors, font-sizes, etc\n @import "@{bowerPath}/bootstrap/less/glyphicons.less";\n // this override only works because of modifyVarsNoEmbed is used in generated Gruntfile.js\n-@icon-font-path: "++plone++static/fonts/";\n+@icon-font-path: "/++plone++static/fonts/";\n'

Repository: plone.staticresources


Branch: refs/heads/1.x

Repository: plone.staticresources


Branch: refs/heads/1.x
Date: 2021-03-19T14:11:32+01:00
Author: Peter Holzer (agitator) <peter.holzer@agitator.com>
Commit: https://github.com/plone/plone.staticresources/commit/3e2a813e3b22db3ae0e0fa6504c283dc81f21128

update news

Files changed:
M news/131.bugfix

b'diff --git a/news/131.bugfix b/news/131.bugfix\nindex 42f87ac9..51b68e6d 100644\n--- a/news/131.bugfix\n+++ b/news/131.bugfix\n@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@\n-Reduce bundle sizes by not inlining fonts in each bundle - moved plone-fontello and glyphicons to their own bundle.\n+Reduce bundle sizes by not inlining fonts in each bundle - moved plone-fontello and glyphicons to their own bundle. Icon font bundles use fonts from ++plone++static/fonts/.\n [agitator]\n\\ No newline at end of file\n'
